mapper.select: select incident.incident_id incident_id ,incident.apply_no apply_no ,incident.applicant applicant ,incident.appdate appdate ,incident.status status ,incident.incident_type incident_type ,incident.cert_type cert_type ,incident.cert_number cert_number ,incident.email email ,incident.company_name company_name ,incident.company_type company_type ,incident.social_credit_code social_credit_code ,incident.description description ,resiapply.fa_id fa_id ,resiapply.cm_sta cm_sta ,resiapply.update_dttm update_dttm ,resiapply.cis_company cis_company ,resiapply.business_type business_type ,resiapply.per_name per_name ,resiapply.xzq xzq_apply ,resiapply.address address ,resiapply.apply_content apply_content ,resiapply.con_name con_name ,resiapply.phone phone ,resiapply.mail mail ,resiapply.wygz wygz ,resiapply.contact_address contact_address from usw_resident_apply resiapply inner join mcs_incident incident on resiapply.incident_id = incident.incident_id
